description.en: [They’re both Betas, college students, and models--but this Alpha and Omega are just pretending to be Betas! A story of the varying life choices made after the start of heat.] College student and model Sari is really an Omega, but hates it so much he’s decided to live as a Beta. One day, his manager (and nee-chan) asks him to scout Taiga, another Beta at the same school for a pair modelling session. The two hit it off from their first meeting and celebrate the end of the shoot. Sari feels comfortable with Taiga, but under some intoxicating force he goes into heat from Taiga’s smell. Although he thought Taiga was a Beta, it turns out that just like Sari, he’s been hiding his real sex, and is actually an Alpha…!? This Omegaverse BL starts with the two fake Betas becoming bonded mates. Bonus limited electronic extras!

links.amz: https://www.amazon.co.jp/渇欲スキャンダル-バーズコミックス-リンクスコレクション-倉橋蝶子/dp/4344849280
